      • dispatchSwipe

        public void dispatchSwipe​(float startX,
                          float startY,
                          long startTime,
                          float endX,
                          float endY,
                          long endTime)
        Dispatch a swipe from one location to another with a set duration
        Parameters:
        startX - x-val of swipe start
        startY - y-val of swipe start
        startTime - when the swipe began
        endX - x-val of swipe end
        endY - y-val of swipe end
        endTime - when the swipe ended

public void dispatchDrag​(float startX,

                         float endY,
                         long endTime,
                         boolean newDrag)
        Dispatch a drag from one location to another with a set duration
        Parameters:
        startX - x-val of swipe start
        startY - y-val of swipe start
        startTime - when the swipe began
        endX - x-val of swipe end
        endY - y-val of swipe end
        endTime - when the swipe ended
